muxt generate

exec go doc -all .
! stdout 'Code generated by muxt generate'

-- index.gohtml --
{{define "GET /"}}
	<h1>Hello!</h1>
{{end}}

-- go.mod --
module example.com

go 1.24
-- template.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed *.gohtml
var templateSrc embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(templateSrc, "*.gohtml"))
